Method Detail

obtainAccessTokenBasicCredentials

public javax.ws.rs.core.Response obtainAccessTokenBasicCredentials(java.lang.String clientId,
                                                                   java.lang.String clientSecret,
                                                                   java.lang.String grant,
                                                                   java.lang.String scopes,
                                                                   java.lang.String userName,
                                                                   java.lang.String password)
Token edpoint to obtain access token with "Resource Owner Basic Credentials" as described in the OAuth 2 specification (Section 4.1.2). The only gant_type supported is "password". The only way to send client credentials is the use of query parameters.

Specified by:
obtainAccessTokenBasicCredentials in interface AuthorizationController
Parameters:
clientId - Client identifier. Not used now, must be null.
clientSecret - Client secret. Not used now, must be null.
grant - Access grant type. For now, only "password" supported.
scopes - Space separated list of object that will be accessed. For now, must be empty..
userName - End-user name.
password - End-user password.
Returns:
An TokenResponse (HTTP 200) if the request is successful, a ObtainTokenErrorResponse (HTTP 400) otherwise.

obtainTokenInformation

public Token obtainTokenInformation(java.lang.String accessToken,
                                    java.lang.String password)
Retrieves all information relative to an access token.

Specified by:
obtainTokenInformation in interface AuthorizationController
Parameters:
accessToken - The access token (query parameter access_token").
password - The service shared secret (header value of "Authorization" header).
Returns:
A Token object (HTTP 200) containing all informations, or null if no access token found (HTTP 204)
